issue.title: [C#] Implement IEqualityComparer<Schema> and IEqualityComparer<Field>
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4666](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4666). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement IEqualityComparer<Schema> and IEqualityComparer<Field>

Both are necessary to check for Schema/Field equality.
